body:
The map 'Dry Heaven' i believe a new map that has diamonds... but not crafting tables or wood around to use... If this is suppose to be tell me, if not is there possibility to maybe add some wood or crafting tables lol.
Thanks - nebula02 is the server this map is on!

title: New map, Small Ishu....

replies.body: Thanks for your concern but you should report this issue on GitHub. Or you can try to contact the map developers about this.
